TEXT: While training in the Tower of Heroes a strange phenomenon appeared. NL The prince and his companions now explore a place identified as the Spire.
You order your units to attack the heart.

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us~ ~your~ ~highness,~ ~and~ ~feel~ ~the~ ~warmth~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire."~
The White Emperor leads an expedition to investigate NL the mysterious powers hidden in the Spire.
You attack the heart along your comrades.

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us~ ~warrior,~ ~and~ ~feel~ ~the~ ~warmth~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire."~
Vincent travels the world in order to make amends to his family and not being able to save them. NL Now he will explore the Spire, but he is not alone.
You prepare your Final Trump Card against the heart.

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us~ ~hunter,~ ~and~ ~feel~ ~the~ ~warmth~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire."~
